description: The conservative commenter said Wednesday that an 81-year-old dying of the coronavirus "is not the same thing" as a younger person dying from it.
title: Ben Shapiro Suggests Older People Dying Of COVID-19 Is 'Tragic,' But Also Not So Bad
title_page: Ben Shapiro Suggests Older People Dying Of COVID-19 Is 'Tragic,' But Also Not So Bad | HuffPost
